name: SparseSymbolicFactorOptions
desc: A structure that contains options that affect the symbolic stage of a sparse factorization.

items.name: init(control: SparseControl_t, orderMethod: SparseOrder_t, order: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>?, ignoreRowsAndColumns: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>?, malloc: (Int) -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, free: (UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> Void, reportError: ((UnsafePointer<CChar>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Creates a new structure that contains options that affect the symbolic stage of a sparse factorization.

items.name: var control: SparseControl_t
items.desc: The flags that control the computation.

items.name: struct SparseOrder_t
items.desc: Options that define which ordering algorithm to use.

items.name: var ignoreRowsAndColumns: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>?
items.desc: An array that contains row and column indices to ignore.

items.name: var malloc: (Int) -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: The function for allocating any necessary storage.

items.name: var free: (UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> Void
items.desc: The function for freeing allocated storage.

items.name: var reportError: ((UnsafePointer<CChar>) -> Void)?
items.desc: The function for reporting parameter errors.
